net.sf.jclal.activelearning.algorithm

Class AbstractALAlgorithm

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jclal.activelearning.algorithm.AbstractALAlgorithm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, IAlgorithm, IConfigure, ITool, JCLAL
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClassicalALAlgorithm

    public abstract class AbstractALAlgorithm
extends Object
implements IAlgorithm, IConfigure, ITool
    Abstract implementation of the classic active learning process.
    Author:
    Oscar Gabriel Reyes Pupo, Eduardo Perez Perdomo
